name: PayPal - Dark n Simple
description: Changes PayPal to a dark grey or grey to make it easy for the eyes at low lit areas.

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch

V1.2 (November 27th, 2017): ► Minor changes and fixes. V1.1 (April 25th, 2017): ► Themed most of the website while logged in. ► Fixed hovering over payments won't show weird line on the right. V1.0 (April 23rd, 2017): ► Initial release. This is an early build, there will be things that aren't themed Twitter YouTube Twitch Website
